title: Syncing stuck at block 14999999
body:
I'm trying to sync a new node from scratch. I'm using erigon and lighthouse. For Erigon I'm seeing this repeated:

```
INFO[09-26|16:39:14.193] [txpool] stat                            block=14999999 pending=8665 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=2.5GB sys=3.3GB
INFO[09-26|16:40:14.066] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=33
INFO[09-26|16:40:14.074] [txpool] stat                            block=14999999 pending=8665 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=2.8GB sys=3.3GB
INFO[09-26|16:41:14.075] [txpool] stat                            block=14999999 pending=8665 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=2.4GB sys=3.3GB
INFO[09-26|16:42:14.066] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=32
INFO[09-26|16:42:14.075] [txpool] stat                            block=14999999 pending=8665 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=2.7GB sys=3.3GB
```

Lighthouse:

```
Sep 26 16:42:08.547 ERRO No synced execution endpoint            advice: ensure you have an execution node configured via --execution-endpoint or if pre-merge, --eth1-endpoints, service: deposit_contract_rpc
Sep 26 16:42:08.547 ERRO Error updating deposit contract cache   error: "All fallbacks errored: http://127.0.0.1:8551/, auth=true => EndpointError(FarBehind)", retry_millis: 60000, service: deposit_contract_rpc
Sep 26 16:42:17.001 INFO Syncing                                 est_time: 23 hrs 54 mins, speed: 53.34 slots/sec, distance: 4590177 slots (91 weeks 0 days), peers: 15, service: slot_notifier
Sep 26 16:42:17.001 WARN Syncing deposit contract block cache    est_blocks_remaining: initializing deposits, service: slot_notifier
Sep 26 16:42:17.004 INFO Ready for the merge                     current_difficulty: 52207645034768285718504, terminal_total_difficulty: 58750000000000000000000, service: slot_notifier
Sep 26 16:42:29.001 INFO Syncing                                 est_time: 23 hrs 54 mins, speed: 53.34 slots/sec, distance: 4589538 slots (91 weeks 0 days), peers: 14, service: slot_notifier
Sep 26 16:42:29.001 WARN Syncing deposit contract block cache    est_blocks_remaining: initializing deposits, service: slot_notifier
Sep 26 16:42:29.004 INFO Ready for the merge                     current_difficulty: 52207645034768285718504, terminal_total_difficulty: 58750000000000000000000, service: slot_notifier
Sep 26 16:42:41.001 INFO Syncing                                 est_time: 1 day 0 hrs, speed: 52.00 slots/sec, distance: 4588963 slots (91 weeks 0 days), peers: 14, service: slot_notifier
Sep 26 16:42:41.001 WARN Syncing deposit contract block cache    est_blocks_remaining: initializing deposits, service: slot_notifier
Sep 26 16:42:41.004 INFO Ready for the merge                     current_difficulty: 52207645034768285718504, terminal_total_difficulty: 58750000000000000000000, service: slot_notifier
Sep 26 16:42:53.000 INFO Syncing                                 est_time: 1 day 0 hrs, speed: 52.00 slots/sec, distance: 4588324 slots (91 weeks 0 days), peers: 14, service: slot_notifier
Sep 26 16:42:53.001 WARN Syncing deposit contract block cache    est_blocks_remaining: initializing deposits, service: slot_notifier
Sep 26 16:42:53.004 INFO Ready for the merge                     current_difficulty: 52207645034768285718504, terminal_total_difficulty: 58750000000000000000000, service: slot_notifier
```

Any ideas on how to get past this?

startup:

```

stats will show the latest executed block. You are currently downloading blocks so stats will be updated once you execute them.

For Erigon I'm seeing this repeated :

seem as me
Has this been fixed yet?
There's nothing wrong here. AskAlexSharov made it clear that it's because it's indexing logs still, as obvious in the logs.
need lighthouse

> danssion

Any update on that ? we are facing that same issue.
@mtgnoah @danssion @UsmannK @long568 @0xakihiko. Did anyone find a solution for the aforementioned issue?

Before this error, we used erigon version 2.28.1-stable and Lighthouse v3.2.0, it kept struck here for more than 1 day, so we are currently trying using erigon version 2.28.1-dev-11f4978e and Lighthouse v3.2.1-6d5a2b5, still getting the same error.

This is the logs that is repeating in the lighthouse. 

Nov 03 06:01:37 lighthouse[57299]: Nov 03 06:01:37.896 INFO New block received root: 0x2a8fba84f3417a305750eae6854639df3b68819b96952a83791e12c82d9fcfe9, slot: 5052606

Nov 03 06:01:41 lighthouse[57299]: Nov 03 06:01:41.000 WARN Syncing deposit contract block cache est_blocks_remaining: initializing deposits, service: slot_notifier

completely new maching, fresh arch linux install, 64GB RAM, 2 2tb nvme drives in software raid 0, 4th day of sync today, stuck at block 14999999
